text: "Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'" is a song by American singer-songwriter Michael Jackson from his sixth studio album Thriller, released in 1982. It is the opening track of the album and was released as its fourth single on May 9, 1983, by Epic Records. It was written and co-produced by Jackson and produced by Quincy Jones. It's known for its infectious beat, energetic vocals, and the iconic line "Mama-say mama-sa mama-coo-sa." The song explores themes of ambition and the pressures of fame. It's a standout track on an album that has had a lasting impact on pop music. The song does not have a music video to accompany it, but it was performed live by Jackson in all of his world concert tours. Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:1983 songs
title: Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'
